attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why do you we need the kids channels' shows back, you ask?
Well, think of it this way, when you were a teenager have you thought about what kind of rubbish is on television? I have, look at Nickelodeon, I grew up to be quite a normal teenager, I still am infact. But when I see people like 12 year olds who watch the newer shows on the channel, they learn that richer people are conceited snobs, that looking good is a must and personality matters nothing, they learn that your younger siblings are trouble and you should steer clear, and your older siblings can't be trusted. I'm not an adult, I'm a teenager, worrying what is being shown on television.
Bring back the oldies: Ren & Stimpy, Chalkboard, Arghhh! Real Monsters!, Rugrats, Danny Phantom, ect.
Those T.V shows teach morals, take Rugrats for an example, it teaches kids to work together as a team, stand up to bullies and anything is possible if you try. In the newer shows it gives off that message of what exactly?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
